languages.text: "Наши корабли никогда не прокладывают курс за вуалью. И я... я никогда не путешествовала так, как это делаете вы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Признаюсь, элантах, для меня это было... внове". {n}В голос Ирлиэт прокрадываются виноватые нотки.{/n} "Я утратила спокойствие духа, позволила смятению проникнуть в сердце и почти отступилась с Пути. Моя секундная ошибка привлекла внимание Той, Что Жаждет, и я призвала все свои силы и познания, дабы в медитации достичь баланса и укрыть свою душу за нерушимой стеной выдержки. Будущие путешествия за вуалью будут все еще сложны для меня... но я скреплю сердце и не дам гончим Сай'лантреш вновь взять мой след".

traits.locale_text: "Наши корабли никогда не прокладывают курс за вуалью. И я... я никогда не путешествовала так, как это делаете вы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Признаюсь, элантах, для меня это было... внове". {n}В голос Ирлиэт прокрадываются виноватые нотки.{/n} "Я утратила спокойствие духа, позволила смятению проникнуть в сердце и почти отступилась с Пути. Моя секундная ошибка привлекла внимание Той, Что Жаждет, и я призвала все свои силы и познания, дабы в медитации достичь баланса и укрыть свою душу за нерушимой стеной выдержки. Будущие путешествия за вуалью будут все еще сложны для меня... но я скреплю сердце и не дам гончим Сай'лантреш вновь взять мой след".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."
languages.original_text: "Наши корабли никогда не прокладывают курс за вуалью. И я... я никогда не путешествовала так, как это делаете вы, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}. Признаюсь, элантах, для меня это было... внове". {n}В голос Ирлиэт прокрадываются виноватые нотки.{/n} "Я утратила спокойствие духа, позволила смятению проникнуть в сердце и почти отступилась с Пути. traits.locale_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, mon-keigh. Elantar, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind the impenetrable wall of resolve. The future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I am going to steel my heart and won't let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

languages.text: “我们自己的舰船从没去过面纱之后的世界，而且我……我从来都没有像你们{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}这样旅行过。外界人，我承认……这样的体验很新奇。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音中带着一丝愧疚。{/n}“我失去了冷静。担忧钻进了我的内心，让我几乎偏离了道路。这片刻的犹豫引起了饥渴女士的注意，但我随后便唤起了我的意志，利用冥想的力量重新恢复了平衡，将我的灵魂隐藏在不可逾越的决心之墙后面。未来穿越面纱的旅程依然会充满艰险……但我会坚定我的心灵，不会让赛·兰斯雷什的猎犬再次嗅到我的气味。”
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, mon-keigh. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

languages.text: «Nuestras naves nunca se aventuran a través del velo. Y yo... nunca he viajado como tú, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, admito que esta ha sido... una experiencia nueva». {n}Detectas un deje de culpabilidad en la voz de Yrliet.{/n} «Perdí la compostura, permití que el desaliento asiera mi corazón y estuve a punto de desviarme de la Senda. Ese momento de duda atrajo la atención de la Sedienta, pero hice acopio de voluntad e utilicé el conocimiento de la meditación para recuperar el equilibrio y ocultar mi alma tras un muro de resolución impenetrable. Los próximos viajes al otro lado del velo seguirán siendo difíciles... pero estaré preparada y no dejaré que los sabuesos de Sai'lanthresh vuelvan a reconocer mi olor».
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras naves nunca se aventuran a través del velo. Y yo... nunca he viajado como tú, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, admito que esta ha sido... una experiencia nueva». {n}Detectas un deje de culpabilidad en la voz de Yrliet.{/n} «Perdí la compostura, permití que el desaliento asiera mi corazón y estuve a punto de desviarme de la Senda. Ese momento de duda atrajo la atención de la Sedienta, pero hice acopio de voluntad e utilicé el conocimiento de la meditación para recuperar el equilibrio y ocultar mi alma tras un muro de resolución impenetrable. Los próximos viajes al otro lado del velo seguirán siendo difíciles... pero estaré preparada y no dejaré que los sabuesos de Sai'lanthresh vuelvan a reconocer mi olor».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我らの船は、ヴェールを越えて冒険することはない。我は…{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}、お前のような旅はしたことがない。エランタ、これは認めよう…斬新な経験だった、と」{n}ユリエットの声にはほのかな罪悪感がにじんでいた。{/n}「我は冷静さを失い、狼狽を胸に秘め、危うく道を踏み外すところだった。この一瞬のためらいが、かの渇きたる女の注意を引いてしまった。だが、我は己の意志を奮い立たせ、瞑想の知識を用いて均衡を保ち、魂を決意の壁の後ろに隠した。これより先、ヴェールを越える旅はまだ難しいだろう…しかし、我は心を強くし、二度とセランスレッシュの猟犬に匂いを嗅ぎつけさせないようにしよう」
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの船は、ヴェールを越えて冒険することはない。我は…{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}、お前のような旅はしたことがない。エランタ、これは認めよう…斬新な経験だった、と」{n}ユリエットの声にはほのかな罪悪感がにじんでいた。{/n}「我は冷静さを失い、狼狽を胸に秘め、危うく道を踏み外すところだった。この一瞬のためらいが、かの渇きたる女の注意を引いてしまった。だが、我は己の意志を奮い立たせ、瞑想の知識を用いて均衡を保ち、魂を決意の壁の後ろに隠した。これより先、ヴェールを越える旅はまだ難しいだろう…しかし、我は心を強くし、二度とセランスレッシュの猟犬に匂いを嗅ぎつけさせないようにしよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere Schiffe wagen sich nie hinter den Schleier. Und ich ... Ich bin nie gereist, wie Ihr es tut, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Elantach, ich muss gestehen, das war ... ein völlig neues Erlebnis." {n}In Yrliets Stimme liegt ein Hauch von Schuldbewusstsein.{/n} "Ich habe die Fassung verloren, habe die Bestürzung in mein Herz gelassen und bin fast vom Pfad abgekommen. Dieser Augenblick des Zögerns hat die Aufmerksamkeit von Ihr, die dürstet, geweckt, doch ich habe meinen Willen zusammengenommen und mein Wissen der Meditation genutzt, um ein Gleichgewicht herzustellen und meine Seele hinter einer undurchdringlichen Wand der Entschlossenheit zu verbergen. Zukünftige Reisen hinter den Schleier werden weiterhin schwierig sein ... Doch ich werde mein Herz stählen und den Hunden von Sai'lanthresh nicht gestatten, meine Fährte erneut zu wittern."
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Schiffe wagen sich nie hinter den Schleier. Und ich ... Ich bin nie gereist, wie Ihr es tut, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Elantach, ich muss gestehen, das war ... ein völlig neues Erlebnis." {n}In Yrliets Stimme liegt ein Hauch von Schuldbewusstsein.{/n} "Ich habe die Fassung verloren, habe die Bestürzung in mein Herz gelassen und bin fast vom Pfad abgekommen. Dieser Augenblick des Zögerns hat die Aufmerksamkeit von Ihr, die dürstet, geweckt, doch ich habe meinen Willen zusammengenommen und mein Wissen der Meditation genutzt, um ein Gleichgewicht herzustellen und meine Seele hinter einer undurchdringlichen Wand der Entschlossenheit zu verbergen. Zukünftige Reisen hinter den Schleier werden weiterhin schwierig sein ... Doch ich werde mein Herz stählen und den Hunden von Sai'lanthresh nicht gestatten, meine Fährte erneut zu wittern."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nos vaisseaux ne franchissent jamais le voile, et je... je n'avais jamais voyagé comme vous le faites, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Je dois avouer que c'était... une expérience inédite pour moi, {n}déclare Yrliet avec un soupçon de culpabilité dans sa voix.{/n} J'ai perdu mon sang-froid, j'ai laissé le désarroi envahir mon cœur et j'ai failli me détourner de la Voie. C'est ce moment d'hésitation qui a attiré l'attention de l'Assoiffée. Heureusement, j'ai réussi à rassembler ma volonté et médité pour rétablir mon équilibre, tout en cachant mon âme derrière un mur impénétrable de résolution. Il me sera toujours difficile de voyager au-delà du voile... mais je fortifierai mon cœur et je ne laisserai plus jamais les chiens de Sai'lanthresh flairer mon odeur. »
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.locale_text: « Nos vaisseaux ne franchissent jamais le voile, et je... je n'avais jamais voyagé comme vous le faites, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Je dois avouer que c'était... une expérience inédite pour moi, {n}déclare Yrliet avec un soupçon de culpabilité dans sa voix.{/n} J'ai perdu mon sang-froid, j'ai laissé le désarroi envahir mon cœur et j'ai failli me détourner de la Voie. C'est ce moment d'hésitation qui a attiré l'attention de l'Assoiffée. Heureusement, j'ai réussi à rassembler ma volonté et médité pour rétablir mon équilibre, tout en cachant mon âme derrière un mur impénétrable de résolution. Il me sera toujours difficile de voyager au-delà du voile... mais je fortifierai mon cœur et je ne laisserai plus jamais les chiens de Sai'lanthresh flairer mon odeur. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Gemilerimiz daha önce örtünün ötesine seyahat etmedi. Ben de... Sizin yöntemlerinizle yolculuk yapmadım {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, itiraf etmem gerekir ki... Benzersiz bir tecrübe yaşıyorum." {n}Yrliet'in sesinde suçluluk iması seziliyor.{/n} "İtidalimi kaybettim, kederin yüreğimde yer etmesine izin verdim ve Yolumdan neredeyse saptım. İşte bu bir anlık tereddüt, Susayan'ın dikkatini üzerime çekti. Ancak irademi topladım, dengeye erişmek için meditasyon irfanını kullandım ve ruhumu; kararlılıkla ördüğüm, yol vermez bir duvarın ardına sakladım. Gelecekte örtünün ötesine yapacağımız yolculuklar yine zorlu olacaktır. Ancak ben, yüreğimi merhamete kapatacağım. Sai'lanthresh'in tazıları da kokumu bir daha asla alamayacak."
languages.original_text: "Our ships never venture beyond the veil. And I... I never travelled the way you do, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, I admit this was... a novel experience." {n}There is a hint of guilt in Yrliet's voice.{/n} "I lost composure, let dismay into my heart, and almost strayed from the Path. This moment of hesitation drew the attention of She Who Thirsts, but I summoned my will and used the knowledge of meditation to achieve balance and hide my soul behind an impenetrable wall of resolve. Future journeys beyond the veil will still be difficult... But I will steel my heart, and not let the hounds of Sai'lanthresh pick up my scent ever again."

traits.locale_text: "Gemilerimiz daha önce örtünün ötesine seyahat etmedi. Ben de... Senin yöntemlerinle yolculuk yapmadım {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}. Elantach, itiraf etmem gerekir ki... Benzersiz bir tecrübe yaşıyorum." {n}Yrliet'in sesinde suçluluk iması seziliyor.{/n} "İtidalimi kaybettim, kederin yüreğimde yer etmesine izin verdim ve Yolumdan neredeyse saptım. İşte bu bir anlık tereddüt, Susayan'ın dikkatini üzerime çekti. Ancak irademi topladım, dengeye erişmek için meditasyon irfanını kullandım ve ruhumu kararlılıkla ördüğüm yol vermez bir duvarın ardına sakladım. Gelecekte örtünün ötesine yapacağımız yolculuklar yine de zorlu olacaktır. Ancak ben, yüreğimi merhamete kapatacağım ve Sai'lanthresh'in tazıları, kokumu bir daha asla alamayacaklar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
